long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: An extension for automatically submitting resumes and cover letters on hh.ru. Save time by applying to up to 200 jobs per day in just 15–30 minutes. Fully automated — selects the right job postings, attaches pre-prepared resumes, and sends them with customized cover letters. Ideal for active job seekers who want to maximize their application reach in a short period. Easy to set up, with flexible job filters and support for multiple letter templates.
